title: Where can you get free Mac software? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you are using one of the best & highly recognized brand system named as MacBook, then there is no doubt that everyday you explore through uncountable free software sites for best software. To download the best Mac software below i am going to describe name of few top-listed safe software portals: 1. MacUpdates (http://www.macupdate.com/) official site for Mac software.2. Open Source Mac (http://opensourcemac.org/).3. FreeMacWare (http://www.freemacware.com/).4. SoftMozer (Free Software Download Sites | software downloads - SoftMozer).
Visit MacUpdate and they list which apps are free.
